amendment.description: To end the mobile phone welfare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 338 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 84.

action.text: Amendment SA 338 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S2311-2319; text: CR S2312) To end the mobile phone welfare program.
